SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM( SELECT PLAYER_NO, RESERVATION_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, TIME_VALUE, PLACE_NAME, RESERVATION_TYPE, FIXED_YN, REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT
FROM
(SELECT PLAYER_NO, RESERVATION_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, TIME_VALUE, PLACE_NAME, RESERVATION_TYPE, FIXED_YN FROM PLAYER JOIN RESERVATION USING(RESERVATION_NO) JOIN TIME USING(TIME_NO) JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND FIXED_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2 DESC)
LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(PLAYER_NO) WHERE RESERVATION_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY RESERVATION_DATE DESC
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
